version_description:
-Better controls, improved gameplay.
-New Exclusive Extra Game Level.
-Bigger buttons for iPhone 6+
-Some bugs are now fixed.

-Fixed the erroneus language selection for iOS >9.0
-iOS 9.0 support
-New graphics and effects for Halloween
-Fixed 100% completion bug for level pack 2
-New Game Center achievements

-New Random levels.
-3 new different type of virtual controls: Original Keyboard, Pad, and Joystick.
-Configure the size, position and transparency of the controls. No more bad control excuses :)
-New Achievements and better Game Center integrat

-Fixed wrong color in the background of the sprites in some devices
-Optimized game size
-Fixed a problem in Jin level pack completion
-Fixed achievements for Jin pack

The next version will have a new level pack, stay tuned!

-Fixed wrong color in the background of the sprites in some devices
-Optimized game size
-Fixed a problem in Jin level pack completion
-Fixed achievements for Jin pack

The next version will have a new level pack, stay tuned!

-Fixed a lot of problems
-New "Takumi" level pack
-New traps and items
-Improved joystick and gamepad support and iCade
-Better touch controls
-New graphics and music
-New and stylish UI

-Fixed a bug in the new Takumi Level Pack
-Fixed some problems of the new UI
-New Achievements

-Some minor fixes
-Little graphics extras for the halloween edition
